actions.recommendation: Repeat blood pressure reading on day of medical was normal.
Continue with exercise, less sugar, heavy weight lifting and take some vitamin D when you remember.
Continue to screen your moles annually as you have a fair skin.

Seasonal dry cough April to September, triggered by cold air, interventions have been unhelpful. You experience a left inguinal/lower abdominal pain with exercise sometimes and have a memory of being investigated for an inguinal hernia. No intervention was performed.
